name: Bear Vestige
description: Bear Vestiges are used at theTrophy Benchto create aBear Trophy, which can help prospectors complete theBestiary. They are also used at theAdvanced Textiles Bench/Electric Textiles Benchto makeBear Rugs. Decorative purposes aside, both provide a boost to coziness, which increases the duration and effect of theWell Rested Buff.
